admissions.table_description: The ADMISSIONS table gives information regarding a patient’s admission to the hospital.

admission_location.description: provides information about the previous location of the patient prior to arriving at the hospital
admission_location.name: admission_location

admission_type.description: describes the type of the admission
admission_type.name: admission_type

admittime.description: provides the date and time the patient was admitted to the hospital
admittime.name: admittime

deathtime.description: If applicable, DEATHTIME provides the time of in-hospital death for the patient. Note that DEATHTIME is only present if the patient died in-hospital, and is almost always the same as the patient’s DISCHTIME
deathtime.name: deathtime

diagnosis.description: The DIAGNOSIS column provides a preliminary, free text diagnosis for the patient on hospital admission
diagnosis.name: diagnosis

dischtime.description: provides the date and time the patient was discharged from the hospital
dischtime.name: dischtime

edouttime.description: Time that the patient was discharged from the emergency department
edouttime.name: edouttime

edregtime.description: Time that the patient was registered from the emergency department
edregtime.name: edregtime

hadm_id.description: Each row of this table contains a unique HADM_ID, which represents a single patient’s admission to the hospital. HADM_ID ranges from 1000000 - 1999999.
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

hospital_expire_flag.description: This indicates whether the patient died within the given hospitalization
hospital_expire_flag.name: hospital_expire_flag

subject_id.description: The ADMISSIONS table can be linked to the PATIENTS table using SUBJECT_ID
subject_id.name: subject_id

callout.table_description: Information regarding when a patient was cleared for ICU discharge and when the patient was actually discharged.

acknowledge_status.description: indicates the response to the callout event
acknowledge_status.name: acknowledge_status

acknowledgetime.description: is the time at which the call out was first acknowledged.
acknowledgetime.name: acknowledgetime

callout_outcome.description: indicating whether the patient finally called out (i.e. discharged) or not.
callout_outcome.name: callout_outcome

callout_service.description: is the service under which the patient should be discharged
callout_service.name: callout_service

callout_status.description: indicates whether the call out is still active or not.
callout_status.name: callout_status

callout_wardid.description: identifies the ward to which the patient should be discharged
callout_wardid.name: callout_wardid

createtime.description: provides the time and date that the call out was initiated.
createtime.name: createtime

curr_careunit.description: indicates which ICU cost center the CURR_WARDID corresponds to
curr_careunit.name: curr_careunit

curr_wardid.description: identifies the ward in which the patient resides when called out (i.e. prior to discharge/transfer)
curr_wardid.name: curr_wardid

discharge_wardid.description: indicates the ward to which the patient was actually discharged.
discharge_wardid.name: discharge_wardid

hadm_id.description: hospital admission corresponding to the given call out event
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

outcometime.description: is the time at which the CALLOUT_OUTCOME occurred.
outcometime.name: outcometime

request_cdiff.description: binary indicator which request certain precautions for the patient in the subsequent ward where they will reside.
request_cdiff.name: request_cdiff

request_mrsa.description: binary indicator which request certain precautions for the patient in the subsequent ward where they will reside.
request_mrsa.name: request_mrsa

request_resp.description: binary indicator which request certain precautions for the patient in the subsequent ward where they will reside.
request_resp.name: request_resp

request_tele.description: binary indicator which request certain precautions for the patient in the subsequent ward where they will reside.
request_tele.name: request_tele

request_vre.description: binary indicator which request certain precautions for the patient in the subsequent ward where they will reside.
request_vre.name: request_vre

subject_id.description: patient corresponding to the given call out event
subject_id.name: subject_id

submit_careunit.description: indicates whether the SUBMIT_WARDID corresponds to an ICU cost center, and if so, what type of ICU cost center.
submit_careunit.name: submit_careunit

submit_wardid.description: identifies the ward from which the request was submitted
submit_wardid.name: submit_wardid

updatetime.description: provides the last time at which the call out event was updated.
updatetime.name: updatetime

cgid.description: is a unique identifier for each distinct caregiver present in the database
cgid.name: cgid

description.description: provides additional information regarding the caregiver
description.name: description

chartevents.table_description: Contains all charted data for all patients.

cgid.description: is the identifier for the caregiver who validated the given measurement
cgid.name: cgid

charttime.description: records the time at which an observation was made
charttime.name: charttime

error.description: are Metavision specific column which specify if a warning for the value was raised and if an error occurred during the measurement
error.name: error

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustay_id.description: is unique to a patient ICU stay
icustay_id.name: icustay_id

itemid.description: Identifier for a single measurement type in the database
itemid.name: itemid

resultstatus.description: CareVue specific column which specify the type of measurement
resultstatus.name: resultstatus

stopped.description: CareVue specific column which specify the type of measurement
stopped.name: stopped

storetime.description: records the time at which an observation was manually input or manually validated by a member of the clinical staff.
storetime.name: storetime

value.description: contains the value measured for the concept identified
value.name: value

valuenum.description: contains the same data in a numeric format
valuenum.name: valuenum

valueuom.description: is the unit of measurement for the VALUE, if appropriate
valueuom.name: valueuom

warning.description: are Metavision specific column which specify if a warning for the value was raised and if an error occurred during the measurement
warning.name: warning

cptevents.table_description: Contains current procedural terminology (CPT) codes, which facilitate billing for procedures performed on patients.

chartdate.description: The date at which the procedure occurred
chartdate.name: chartdate

costcenter.description: is the cost center which billed for the corresponding CPT codes
costcenter.name: costcenter

cpt_number.description: is a numeric version of the CPT_CD column, which allows for easier range comparisons in querying
cpt_number.name: cpt_number

cpt_suffix.description: column contains the text suffix when the CPT_CD contains non-numeric characters
cpt_suffix.name: cpt_suffix

description.description: provides information about the meaning of the CPT code
description.name: description

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

sectionheader.description: The section headers provide a category for the given CPT code.
sectionheader.name: sectionheader

subsectionheader.description: The section headers provide a category for the given CPT code.
subsectionheader.name: subsectionheader

d_cpt.table_description: High-level definitions for current procedural terminology (CPT) codes.

category.description: is a integer which identifies the category of the CPT code
category.name: category

maxcodeinsubsection.description: numeric representations of maximum value in the SUBSECTIONRANGE column
maxcodeinsubsection.name: maxcodeinsubsection

mincodeinsubsection.description: numeric representations of minimum value in the SUBSECTIONRANGE column
mincodeinsubsection.name: mincodeinsubsection

sectionheader.description: provides the description of the given section
sectionheader.name: sectionheader

sectionrange.description: defines the range of codes for the given section
sectionrange.name: sectionrange

subsectionheader.description: provides the description of the given subsection
subsectionheader.name: subsectionheader

subsectionrange.description: defines the range of codes for the given subsection
subsectionrange.name: subsectionrange

icd9_code.description: is the International Coding Definitions Version 9 (ICD-9) code
icd9_code.name: icd9_code

long_title.description: The title field provide a brief definition for the given diagnosis code in ICD9_CODE.
long_title.name: long_title

short_title.description: The title field provide a brief definition for the given diagnosis code in ICD9_CODE.
short_title.name: short_title

icd9_code.description: is the International Coding Definitions Version 9 (ICD-9) code
icd9_code.name: icd9_code

long_title.description: provides a brief definition for the given procedure code in ICD9_CODE.
long_title.name: long_title

short_title.description: provides a brief definition for the given procedure code in ICD9_CODE.
short_title.name: short_title

d_items.table_description: Definition table for all items in the ICU databases.

abbreviation.description: lists a common abbreviation for the label
abbreviation.name: abbreviation

category.description: provides some information of the type of data
category.name: category

dbsource.description: was generated to clarify which database the given
dbsource.name: dbsource

itemid.description: As an alternate primary key to the table, ITEMID is unique to each row. It represents measurements in the database. Measurements of the same type (e.g. heart rate) will have the same ITEMID (e.g. 211). The ITEMID column is an alternate primary key to this table: it is unique to each row.
itemid.name: itemid

linksto.description: provides the table name which the data links to
linksto.name: linksto

param_type.description: describes the type of data which is recorded: a date, a number or a text field.
param_type.name: param_type

unitname.description: specifies the unit of measurement used
unitname.name: unitname

d_labitems.table_description: Definition table for all laboratory measurements. D_LABITEMS contains definitions for all ITEMID associated with lab measurements in the MIMIC database.

category.description: provides higher level information as to the type of measurement
category.name: category

fluid.description: describes the substance on which the measurement was made
fluid.name: fluid

itemid.description: As a candidate key in the table, ITEMID is unique to each row.
itemid.name: itemid

label.description: escribes the concept which is represented by the ITEMID
label.name: label

loinc_code.description: contains the LOINC code associated with the given ITEMID
loinc_code.name: loinc_code

cgid.description: is the identifier for the caregiver who validated the given measurement
cgid.name: cgid

charttime.description: records the time at which an observation was charted, and is usually the closest proxy to the time the data was actually measured
charttime.name: charttime

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustay_id.description: is unique to a patient ICU stay
icustay_id.name: icustay_id

storetime.description: records the time at which an observation was manually input or manually validated by a member of the clinical staff
storetime.name: storetime

diagnoses_icd.table_description: Contains ICD diagnoses for patients, most notably ICD-9 diagnoses.

hadm_id.description: Identifier to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icd9_code.description: contains the actual code corresponding to the diagnosis assigned to the patient for the given row.
icd9_code.name: icd9_code

seq_num.description: provides the order in which the ICD diagnoses relate to the patient
seq_num.name: seq_num

drgcodes.table_description: Contains diagnosis related groups (DRG) codes for patients.

description.description: provides a human understandable summary of the meaning of the given DRG code
description.name: description

drg_code.description: contains a code which represents the diagnosis billed for by the hospital
drg_code.name: drg_code

drg_mortality.description: provides additional granularity to DRG codes in the ‘APR’ DRG type
drg_mortality.name: drg_mortality

drg_severity.description: provides additional granularity to DRG codes in the ‘APR’ DRG type
drg_severity.name: drg_severity

drg_type.description: provides the type of DRG code in the entry
drg_type.name: drg_type

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustays.table_description: Defines each ICUSTAY_ID in the database, i.e. defines a single ICU stay.

dbsource.description: contains the original ICU database the data was sourced from
dbsource.name: dbsource

first_careunit.description: contain the first ICU type in which the patient was cared for
first_careunit.name: first_careunit

first_wardid.description: contain the first ICU unit in which the patient stayed
first_wardid.name: first_wardid

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustay_id.description: is unique to a patient ICU stay
icustay_id.name: icustay_id

intime.description: provides the date and time the patient was transferred into the ICU
intime.name: intime

last_careunit.description: contain the last ICU type in which the patient was cared for
last_careunit.name: last_careunit

last_wardid.description: contain the last ICU unit in which the patient stayed
last_wardid.name: last_wardid

los.description: is the length of stay for the patient for the given ICU stay, which may include one or more ICU units
los.name: los

outtime.description: provides the date and time the patient was transferred out of the ICU
outtime.name: outtime

amount.description: list the amount of a drug or substance administered to the patient either between the STARTTIME and ENDTIME
amount.name: amount

amountuom.description: list the amount of a drug or substance administered to the patient either between the STARTTIME and ENDTIME
amountuom.name: amountuom

cgid.description: is the identifier for the caregiver who validated the given measurement
cgid.name: cgid

charttime.description: represents the time at which the measurement was charted
charttime.name: charttime

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustay_id.description: is unique to a patient ICU stay
icustay_id.name: icustay_id

itemid.description: Identifier for a single measurement type in the database
itemid.name: itemid

linkorderid.description: links the same order across multiple instantiations
linkorderid.name: linkorderid

newbottle.description: indicates if a new preparation of the solution was hung at the bedside
newbottle.name: newbottle

orderid.description: links multiple items contained in the same solution together
orderid.name: orderid

originalamount.description: provides information about the solution the medication was a part of when it was first entered into the information system.
originalamount.name: originalamount

originalamountuom.description: provides information about the solution the medication was a part of when it was first entered into the information system.
originalamountuom.name: originalamountuom

originalrate.description: provides information about the solution the medication was a part of when it was first entered into the information system.

originalrateuom.name: originalrateuom

originalroute.description: provides information about the solution the medication was a part of when it was first entered into the information system.
originalroute.name: originalroute

originalsite.description: provides information about the solution the medication was a part of when it was first entered into the information system.
originalsite.name: originalsite

rate.description: list the rate at which the drug or substance was administered to the patient either between the STARTTIME and ENDTIME
rate.name: rate

rateuom.description: list the rate at which the drug or substance was administered to the patient either between the STARTTIME and ENDTIME
rateuom.name: rateuom

stopped.description: indicates whether the infusion has been disconnected or continued.
stopped.name: stopped

storetime.description: records the time at which an observation was manually input or manually validated by a member of the clinical staff
storetime.name: storetime

amount.description: list the amount of a drug or substance administered to the patient either between the STARTTIME and ENDTIME
amount.name: amount

amountuom.description: list the amount of a drug or substance administered to the patient either between the STARTTIME and ENDTIME
amountuom.name: amountuom

cancelreason.description: If the order was canceled, this column provides some explanation
cancelreason.name: cancelreason

cgid.description: is the identifier for the caregiver who validated the given measurement
cgid.name: cgid

comments_date.description: Specifies if the order was edited or canceled, and if so, the date and job title of the care giver who canceled or edited it
comments_date.name: comments_date

comments_status.description: Specifies if the order was edited or canceled, and if so, the date and job title of the care giver who canceled or edited it
comments_status.name: comments_status

comments_title.description: Specifies if the order was edited or canceled, and if so, the date and job title of the care giver who canceled or edited it
comments_title.name: comments_title

continueinnextdept.description: If the order ended on patient transfer, this field indicates if it continued into the next department
continueinnextdept.name: continueinnextdept

endtime.description: record the end time of an input/output event
endtime.name: endtime

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustay_id.description: is unique to a patient ICU stay
icustay_id.name: icustay_id

isopenbag.description: Whether the order was from an open bag
isopenbag.name: isopenbag

itemid.description: Identifier for a single measurement type in the database
itemid.name: itemid

linkorderid.description: links the same order across multiple instantiations
linkorderid.name: linkorderid

ordercategorydescription.description: provide higher level information about the order the medication/solution is a part of
ordercategorydescription.name: ordercategorydescription

ordercategoryname.description: provide higher level information about the order the medication/solution is a part of
ordercategoryname.name: ordercategoryname

ordercomponenttypedescription.description: provide higher level information about the order the medication/solution is a part of
ordercomponenttypedescription.name: ordercomponenttypedescription

orderid.description: links multiple items contained in the same solution together
orderid.name: orderid

originalamount.description: This column represents the amount of the drug contained in the bag at STARTTIME
originalamount.name: originalamount

originalrate.description: This is the rate that was input by the care provider

rate.description: list the rate at which the drug or substance was administered to the patient either between the STARTTIME and ENDTIME

rateuom.description: list the rate at which the drug or substance was administered to the patient either between the STARTTIME and ENDTIME
rateuom.name: rateuom

secondaryordercategoryname.description: provide higher level information about the order the medication/solution is a part of

starttime.description: record the start time of an input/output event
starttime.name: starttime

statusdescription.description: It is used to indicate why the delivery of the compound has ended
statusdescription.name: statusdescription

storetime.description: records the time at which an observation was manually input or manually validated by a member of the clinical staff
storetime.name: storetime

totalamount.description: Intravenous administrations are usually given by hanging a bag of fluid at the bedside for continuous infusion over a certain period of time
totalamount.name: totalamount

totalamountuom.description: Intravenous administrations are usually given by hanging a bag of fluid at the bedside for continuous infusion over a certain period of time
totalamountuom.name: totalamountuom

labevents.table_description: Contains all laboratory measurements for a given patient, including out patient data.

charttime.description: records the time at which an observation was charted, and is usually the closest proxy to the time the data was actually measured
charttime.name: charttime

flag.description: indicates whether the laboratory value is considered abnormal or not, using pre-defined thresholds.
flag.name: flag

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay

itemid.description: Identifier for a single measurement type in the database
itemid.name: itemid

value.description: contains the value measured for the concept identified by the ITEMID
value.name: value

valuenum.description: ontains the same data in a numeric format
valuenum.name: valuenum

valueuom.description: is the unit of measurement for the VALUE
valueuom.name: valueuom

microbiologyeven.table_description: Contains microbiology information, including cultures acquired and associated sensitivities.

ab_itemid.description: If an antibiotic was tested against the given organism for sensitivity, the name is listed here.
ab_itemid.name: ab_itemid

ab_name.description: If an antibiotic was tested against the given organism for sensitivity, the name is listed here.
ab_name.name: ab_name

chartdate.description: s the same as CHARTTIME, except there is no time available.
chartdate.name: chartdate

charttime.description: records the time at which an observation was charted, and is usually the closest proxy to the time the data was actually measured

dilution_comparison.description: Dilution values when testing antibiotic sensitivity

interpretation.description: the antibiotic sensitivity, and indicates the results of the test

isolate_num.description: For testing antibiotics, the isolated colony
isolate_num.name: isolate_num

org_itemid.description: The organism, if any, which grew when tested
org_itemid.name: org_itemid

org_name.description: The organism, if any, which grew when tested

spec_itemid.description: Specimen which is tested for bacterial growth
spec_itemid.name: spec_itemid

spec_type_desc.description: Specimen which is tested for bacterial growth
spec_type_desc.name: spec_type_desc

category.description: define the type of note recorded

cgid.description: is the identifier for the caregiver who input the note

chartdate.description: records the date at which the note was charted

charttime.description: records the date and time at which the note was charted

description.description: define the type of note recorded

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay

iserror.description: column indicates that a physician has identified this note as an error

storetime.description: records the date and time at which a note was saved into the system

charttime.description: is the time of an output event

icustay_id.name: icustay_id

iserror.description: is a Metavision checkbox where a care giver can specify that an observation is an error

itemid.description: Identifier for a single measurement type in the database

newbottle.description: indicates that a new bag of solution was hung at the given CHARTTIME

stopped.description: indicates if the order was disconnected at the given CHARTTIME

storetime.description: records the time at which an observation was manually input or manually validated by a member of the clinical staff

value.description: list the amount of a substance at the CHARTTIME

valueuom.description: list the amount of a substance at the CHARTTIME

patients.table_description: Defines each SUBJECT_ID in the database, i.e. defines a single patient.

dob.description: is the date of birth of the given patient
dob.name: dob

dod.description: is the date of death for the given patient
dod.name: dod

dod_hosp.description: is the date of death as recorded in the hospital database
dod_hosp.name: dod_hosp

dod_ssn.description: is the date of death from the social security database
dod_ssn.name: dod_ssn

expire_flag.description: is a binary flag which indicates whether the patient died
expire_flag.name: expire_flag

gender.description: is the genotypical sex of the patient.
gender.name: gender

subject_id.description: is a unique identifier which specifies an individual patient
subject_id.name: subject_id

prescriptions.table_description: Contains medication related order entries, i.e. prescriptions.

drug.description: These columns are various representations of the drug prescribed to the patient
drug.name: drug

drug_name_generic.description: These columns are various representations of the drug prescribed to the patient
drug_name_generic.name: drug_name_generic

drug_name_poe.description: These columns are various representations of the drug prescribed to the patient
drug_name_poe.name: drug_name_poe

drug_type.description: provides the type of drug prescribed
drug_type.name: drug_type

enddate.description: specify the date period for which the prescription was valid
enddate.name: enddate

formulary_drug_cd.description: These columns provide a representation of the drug in various coding systems. GSN is the Generic Sequence Number
formulary_drug_cd.name: formulary_drug_cd

gsn.description: These columns provide a representation of the drug in various coding systems. GSN is the Generic Sequence Number
gsn.name: gsn

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustay_id.description: is unique to a patient ICU stay
icustay_id.name: icustay_id

ndc.description: These columns provide a representation of the drug in various coding systems. GSN is the Generic Sequence Number
ndc.name: ndc

startdate.description: specify the date period for which the prescription was valid
startdate.name: startdate

procedures_icd.table_description: Contains ICD procedures for patients, most notably ICD-9 procedures

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icd9_code.description: provides the ICD-9 code for the given procedure
icd9_code.name: icd9_code

seq_num.description: provides the order in which the procedures were performed
seq_num.name: seq_num

services.table_description: Lists services that a patient was admitted/transferred under.

curr_service.description: current service that the patient resides under.
curr_service.name: curr_service

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

prev_service.description: previous  service that the patient resides under.
prev_service.name: prev_service

transfertime.description: is the time at which the patient moved from the PREV_SERVICE
transfertime.name: transfertime

transfers.table_description: Physical locations for patients throughout their hospital stay

curr_careunit.description: contains the care unit in which the patient currently resides
curr_careunit.name: curr_careunit

curr_wardid.description: contain the current ward in which the patient stayed
curr_wardid.name: curr_wardid

dbsource.description: contains the original ICU database the data was sourced from
dbsource.name: dbsource

hadm_id.description: is unique to a patient hospital stay
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustay_id.description: is unique to a patient ICU stay
icustay_id.name: icustay_id

intime.description: provides the date and time the patient was transferred into the current care unit from the previous care unit
intime.name: intime

los.description: is the length of stay for the patient for the given ward stay, which may be within or outside of the ICU.
los.name: los

outtime.description: provides the date and time the patient was transferred out of the current care unit
outtime.name: outtime

prev_careunit.description: contains the care unit in which the patient previously resided.

prev_wardid.description: contain the previous ward in which the patient stayed
